Articles.Content: So i was wondering were would the KSP Kerbal model be stored?

hmm.... People have extracted it to sketchfab I believe and done things with it, try there first, if not, a Kerbal is a "part" so you could find it in the gamedata-->squad folder and extract it using the .mu exporter.... Someone else will probably churn out the links soon enough...
Well what i mean is the file location.... But thanks for the info
Thread title made me think of Jeb walking down the catwalk, in the latest EVA suit.

Thread title made me think of Jeb walking down the catwalk, in the latest EVA suit.

lol i just can't stop laughing at that...

The model for the Kerbal is not stored as a 'part' or in any of the folders you will find in the download (at least to the best of my knowledge), It is compiled as part of the game, so you will need a program like ninja ripper to get to them.
so is there any way to get it out?
